text: Aakhir e kaar shaytan ne in dono ko is darakht ki targeeb dekar hamare hukum ki pairwi se hata diya aur inhein us haalat se nikalwa kar chodha jismein woh thay. Humne hukum diya ke, ab tum sab yahan se utar jao, tum ek dusre ke dushman ho aur tumhein ek khaas waqt tak zameen (mein) theharna aur wahin guzar basar karna hai”
